sentences.en: But the applications went to the local police, who had no interest in letting troublemakers congregate.
sentences.cn: 但是当地方警察予以实施时, 他们对让那些惹麻烦的人集合起来毫无兴趣.

sentences.en: Crowds began to congregate to hear the President’s speech.
sentences.cn: 人群开始聚拢，来聆听总统的演讲。

sentences.en: Fang Hung - chien said with a grin, " Whenever politicians congregate, there's bound to be heavy pollution. "
sentences.cn: 方鸿 渐 笑道: “ 政治家聚在一起, 当然是乌烟瘴气. ”

sentences.en: I feel happy and important to know, all of you congregate here because of me.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴,知道你们是因为我聚集到这里很重要.

sentences.en: Many Aquarians like small weddings in unusual places where friends, more than family, congregate to celebrate.
sentences.cn: 水瓶:许多瓶子喜欢与朋友, 而不是和家人一起庆祝自己的婚礼.

sentences.en: On New Year's Eve, close to a million people congregate there to celebrate.
sentences.cn: 每年的新年前夕, 将近一百万人在这里庆祝新年.

sentences.en: Once each week multitudes congregate at worshiping to pay homage and respet to Him.
sentences.cn: 每星期有几天,无数的群众聚集敬拜颂赞他.

sentences.en: People congregate to listen me speak.
sentences.cn: 大部分人聚集在一起听我演说.

sentences.en: Sometimes sex offenders are barred from living near places where children congregate.
sentences.cn: 有时候他们被禁止居住在儿童聚集的地方.
知识界人士通常都在那里聚会.

sentences.en: We sacrifice some personal purposes, take up the responsibility congregate for some common interests.
sentences.cn: 我们牺牲了个人的某些目的, 担负起职责,为了一些共同的利益,走到了一起.

sentences.en: When the process parameters are not appropriate, the oxide and impurity congregate between the layered microstructures.
sentences.cn: 当工艺参数不恰当时, 该区域层间易产生氧化物和杂质物的富集.

sentences.en: Where crowds of people congregate such as in restaurants, cinemas, theatres and the like.
sentences.cn: 人群聚集处,如餐厅 、 影院 、 剧场等等.

sentences.en: You can't hibernate the winter away, but whenever possible, avoid situations where contagious people congregate.
sentences.cn: 虽然你不可能(一些动物那样)冬眠的办法去度过整个冬天, 不过,你还是可以做到尽可能不去那些有传染性的人群聚集的场所.

sentences.en: Young people often congregate in the main square in the evenings.
sentences.cn: 年轻人傍晚时经常聚集在大广场上。

trans.tran_en: to come together in a group
